Page1.LastMammo: When was approximately your last mammogram ?
Page1.LastMenstrual: When was your last menstrual period
Page1.InsuranceFrontID: UPLOAD FRONT PICTURE OF INSURANCE CARD
Page1.InsuranceBackID: UPLOAD BACK PICTURE OF INSURANCE CARD

SportPhysical.Illness: Have you had a medical illness or injury since your last check up or physical?
SportPhysical.Hospitalized: Have you been hospitalized overnight in the past year?
SportPhysical.HeartTest: Have you ever had prior testing for the heart ordered by a physician?
SportPhysical.Passed: Have you ever passed out during or after exercise?
SportPhysical.ChestPain: Have you ever had chest pain during or after exercise?
SportPhysical.TiredQuickly: Do you get tired more quickly than your friends do during exercise?
SportPhysical.SkippedHeartbeat: Have you ever had racing of your heart or skipped heartbeats?
SportPhysical.HighBlood: Have you had high blood pressure or high cholesterol?
SportPhysical.Murmur: Have you ever been told you have a heart murmur?
SportPhysical.FamilyMember: Has any family member or relative died of heart problems or of sudden unexpected death before age 50?
SportPhysical.FamilyMemberDied: Has any family member been diagnosed with enlarged heart, (dilated cardiomyopathy), hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, long QT syndrome or other ion channelpathy (Brugada syndrome, etc), Marfan's syndrome, or abnormal heart rhythm?
SportPhysical.ViralInfection: Have you had a severe viral infection (for example, myocarditis or mononucleosis) within the last month?
SportPhysical.Denied: Has a physician ever denied or restricted your participation in activities for any heart problems?
SportPhysical.HeadInjury: Have you ever had a head injury or concussion?
SportPhysical.MemoryLoss: Have you ever been knocked out, become unconscious, or lost your memory?
SportPhysical.HowSevere: How severe was each one? (Explain below)
SportPhysical.Seizure: Have you ever had a seizure?
SportPhysical.Headache: Do you have frequent or severe headaches?
SportPhysical.Numbness: Have you ever had numbness or tingling in your arms, hands, legs or feet?
SportPhysical.PinchedNerve: Have you ever had a stinger, burner, or pinched nerve?
SportPhysical.MissingOrgan: Are you missing any paired organs?
SportPhysical.UnderDrCare: Are you under a doctor’s care?
SportPhysical.TakingMed: Are you currently taking any prescription or non-prescription (over-the-counter) medication or pills or using an inhaler?
SportPhysical.Alergy: Do you have any allergies (for example, to pollen, medicine, food, or stinging insects)?
SportPhysical.Dizzy: Have you ever been dizzy during or after exercise?
SportPhysical.SkinProblem: Do you have any current skin problems (for example, itching, rashes, acne, warts, fungus, or blisters)?
SportPhysical.HeatIllness: Have you ever become ill from exercising in the heat?
SportPhysical.EyeProblem: Have you had any problems with your eyes or vision?
SportPhysical.ShortBreath: Have you ever gotten unexpectedly short of breath with exercise?
SportPhysical.SeasonalAlergy: Do you have seasonal allergies that require medical treatment?
SportPhysical.Protective: Do you use any special protective or corrective equipment or devices that aren't usually used for your activity or position (for example, knee brace, special neck roll, foot orthotics, retainer on your teeth, hearing aid)?
SportPhysical.InjurySwelling: Have you ever had a sprain, strain, or swelling after injury?
SportPhysical.FracturedBone: Have you broken or fractured any bones or dislocated any joints?
SportPhysical.BoneSwell: Have you had any other problems with pain or swelling in muscles, tendons, bones, or joints?
SportPhysical.Checkbox: If yes, check appropriate box and explain below:
SportPhysical.Head: Head
SportPhysical.Weigh: Do you want to weigh more or less than you do now?
SportPhysical.SickleCell: Have you ever been diagnosed with or treated for sickle cell trait or sickle cell disease?
SportPhysical.TesticularSwelling: Do you have any testicular swelling or masses?
SportPhysical.FirstMenstrual: When was your first menstrual period?
SportPhysical.RecentMenstrual: When was your most recent menstrual period?
SportPhysical.MenstrualTime: How much time do you usually have from the start of one period to the start of another?
SportPhysical.LastYearPeriods: How many periods have you had in the last year?
SportPhysical.LongestTime: What was the longest time between periods in the last year?
SportPhysical.ECG: An electrocardiogram (ECG) is not required. By checking this box, I choose to obtain an ECG for my student for additional cardiac screening. I have read and understand the information about cardiac screening. I understand it is the responsibility of my family to schedule and pay for such ECG.
SportPhysical.Explain: EXPLAIN ‘YES’ ANSWERS IN THE BOX BELOW:

Immigration.CityReq: City or Town of Birth is Required
Immigration.ReadEnglish: I can read and understand English and have understood all the instructions in this form
Immigration.InterpreterLabel: Provide the following information about the interpreter, if you used one
Immigration.OrganizationName: Interpreter's Business or Organization Name (if any)

DotPhysical.Label: Driver Information
DotPhysical.USDOT: Has your USDOT/FMCSA medical certificate ever been denied or issued for less than 2 years?
DotPhysical.TakingMed: Are you currently taking medications (prescription, over-the-counter, herbal remedies, diet supplements)?
DotPhysical.Label2: Do you have or have you ever had:
DotPhysical.Heart: 5. Heart disease, heart attack, bypass, or other heart problems
DotPhysical.Pace: 6. Pacemaker,stents, implantable devices, or other heart procedures
DotPhysical.Chronic: 9. Chronic (long-term) cough, shortness of breath, or other breathing problems
DotPhysical.Kidney: 11. Kidney problems, kidney stones, or pain/problems with urination
DotPhysical.MentalHealth: 14. Anxiety, depression, nervousness, other mental health problems
DotPhysical.Dizzy: 16. Dizziness, headaches, numbness, tingling, or memory loss
DotPhysical.LimitedUse: 19. Missing or limited use of arm, hand, finger, leg, foot, toe
DotPhysical.Bone: 21. Bone, muscle, joint, or nerve problems
DotPhysical.Infection: 24. Chronic (long-term) infection or other chronic diseases
DotPhysical.SleepDisorder: 25. Sleep disorders, pauses in breathing while asleep, daytime sleepiness, loud snoring
DotPhysical.Apnea: 26. Have you ever had a sleep test (e.g., sleep apnea)?
DotPhysical.NightHospital: 27. Have you ever spent a night in the hospital?
DotPhysical.BrokenBone: 28. Have you ever had a broken bone?
DotPhysical.Tobacco: 29. Have you ever used or do you now use tobacco?
DotPhysical.Illegal: 31. Have you used an illegal substance within the past two years?
DotPhysical.Drug: 32. Have you ever failed a drug test or been dependent on an illegal substance?
DotPhysical.OtherHealth: Other health condition(s) not described above:
DotPhysical.YesAnswerLabel: Did you answer 'yes' to any of questions 1-32? If so, please comment further on those health conditions below
